text: Neo Soul is a genre (style) of music. It combines soul, hip hop soul, alternative hip hop and quiet storm. Some notable artists that make this kind of music are Frank Ocean, Erykah Badu, Adele, Beyonc√©, and Miguel. The term neo soul was created by the record producer Kedar Massenburg. title: Neo soul
